name: Spongebob Season -1
description: You were bored, after a long day. You decided to go to your attic/loft, for your intellectual concern of fun. You opened an old, dusty box, which had every shorts, season and episode of Spongebob. Weird. It has a small set of DVDs covered in a spiderweb, writing Spongebob Season 0. You found it weird, although the series start from season 1. You decided to give it a try.
